name: @prostory/edelweiss
description: Small framework that builds HTML from JS.

scripts.build: npm run clean; rollup --config; npm run copy; npm run test
scripts.copy: npm run copy:docs; npm run copy:settings; npm run copy:license
scripts.copy:docs: cp README.md build/; cp CHANGELOG.md build/
scripts.release: npm run build; npm publish build/ --access public
